nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Workflow installation
* Add a "slug" text property to each blog post (this parameter will be synced with Webflow and will be used to determine if a post is new or already present in your Webflow collection)
* Add a "Sync to Webflow?" checkbox to each blog post
* Connect your accounts and run a test to fill Webflow nodes with the right fields

[![image.png]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.name: Sticky Note17

parameters.content:
### âš™ï¸ Turn blocks into rich text
This is where the magic happens â€” Notion blocks are mapped and turned into their respective html version. Works with all the major rich text elements: headings 1, headings 2, headings 3, normal, bold and italic text, quotes, bulleted lists, numbered lists and images with captions.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note18

parameters.content:
### âœ… Create a new post or update an existing one?
This node compares (by slug) your Notion post with all your Webflow posts and chooses whether to create a new one (in "A only" branch) or update an existing one (in "different" branch).

nodes.name: Add Webflow item id to Notion data

parameters.jsCode:
const compareResult = $json
const notionData = $('Final Notion post data').item.json

const output = {
  ...notionData, // spread notion data
  webflow_item_id: compareResult.different._id.inputB // add the webflow item id
}

return output

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Stickynote Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Stickynote Workflow. This workflow integrates 13 different services: stickyNote, filter, code, scheduleTrigger, merge. It contains 30 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 30
- **Node Types**: 13
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Get simple page data**: notion
- **Get all page data**: notion
- **Take cover url**: set
- **Merge1**: merge
- **Data transporter1**: noOp
- **Get all blog posts1**: notion
- **Is sync checked?1**: filter
- **For each blog post1**: splitInBatches
- **Sticky Note17**: stickyNote
- ... and 20 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
